author: Staff Reporter
text:
All India Students Federation cadre staging road block in Salem on Saturday condemning the arrest of JNU student leader.—Photo: E. Lakshmi Narayanan

Condemning the arrest of Jawaharlal Nehru University (JNU) student union president Kanhaiya Kumar recently, cadre of All India Students Federation (AISF) staged protest and also blocked the road here on Saturday.

Cadre said that the arrest was against the democratic right of freedom of expression and condemned the Centre for its action.

They said that students have right to express their views and attempting to control it will lead to protest across the country.

They raised slogans against the Central government and attempted to enter the Head Post Office near Old Bus Stand.

They also attempted to block the road. Police personnel removed nine cadre.
title: AISF protests JNU student leader’s arrest
